verses.name: Hebrews 4:4
verses.text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise, And God did rest the seventh day from all his works.

verses.name: Hebrews 4:5
verses.text: And in this place again, If they shall enter into my rest.

verses.name: Hebrews 4:6
verses.text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein, and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief:

verses.name: Hebrews 4:7
verses.text: Again, he limiteth a certain day, saying in David, To day, after so long a time; as it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts.
